item.title: Happy Death Day 3 Differences From First 2 Movies Revealed By Original Director
item.description: EXCLUSIVE: Happy Death Day 3 director Christopher Landon reveals what differences the third film will have compared to the first two movies.

item.title: Alex Garland Explains Why The Last Of Us Is "On Another Level" Compared To His Own Work 28 Days Later
item.description: 28 Days Later writer Alex Garland explains how The Last of Us has surpassed the influential horror movie in his eyes.

item.title: Final Destination: Bloodlines' Reported Runtime Sets Horror Franchise Record
item.description: The runtime for Final Destination: Bloodlines has reportedly been revealed, with the big-screen return for the franchise breaking a series trend.
